headline: Jim Cramer on DexCom: “It’s Too Rich a Stock”
summary: DexCom, Inc. (NASDAQ:DXCM) is one of the stocks on Jim Cramer’s radar recently. A caller asked if they should buy, sell, or hold the stock during the lightning round. In response, Cramer said: “You know, it’s too rich a stock, and I do think the GLP-1s are going to have such a dramatic effect on […]
